title: doc: indicate that weekly.html is a historical reference
body:
by **daniel.r.heath**: 
The weekly snapshot history page is still linked to from http://golang.org/project/ but
hasn't updated since 2012-03-27.

Either the link should be removed (no longer updated / useful) or the page should be
kept up-to-date.

Is there an alternative low-traffic way to follow development progress?
